    lbkeyboard: Keyboard Layout Analysis and Optimization

    lbkeyboard-package.Rd

    Tools for analyzing and optimizing keyboard layouts for Luxembourg and multilingual typing. Includes layout visualization, genetic algorithm optimization with a Carpalx-inspired effort model, and a composable rules system for customizing optimization constraints.

    Layout Visualization

    • ggkeyboard: Plot keyboard layouts

    • heatmapize: Create frequency heatmaps

    • print_layout: ASCII keyboard visualization

    • plot_layout: ggkeyboard wrapper for optimized layouts

    Optimization

    • optimize_layout: Genetic algorithm optimization

    • calculate_layout_effort: Calculate typing effort

    • compare_layouts: Compare multiple layouts

    Rules System

    • fix_keys: Fix keys in place (hard constraint)

    • prefer_hand: Soft hand preference

    • prefer_row: Soft row preference

    • balance_hands: Hand balance preference

    • keep_like: Match reference layout

    Author

    Maintainer: Bruno Rodrigues bruno@brodrigues.co (ORCID)
